alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Gonzales; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Caldwell, southeastern Guadalupe and central Gonzales Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 451 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Palmeto State Park, or 16 miles south of Luling, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Luling, Palmeto State Park, Brownsboro, Leesville, Tilmon, Oak Forest, Belmont, Cost, McNeil, Dilworth, McMahan, Little New York, Thompsonville, Ottine, Bebe and Monthalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
